title: Lost rights to my group?
body:
So after not really playing anything other than bots. my friends came back to league and wanted to play with me. As I started playing with them, it kicked in that I didn't have the group title at the end. After browsing the client, I found that I couldn't access the club anymore, but oddly enough, when my friends browsed the club, I was still in charge of it.
Was this a known issue when the new league client was put in place? Or is it something else?

replies.body: Yep, looks to be working properly now! Thank you!
The club name in question is "Gunched the Scrungus" while the attached tag was "Gunch"
Thanks!  Relog, and let me know if everything looks okay now!

This was a known issue a whle back, where some club owners couldn't see their clubs.  While the issue has since been resolved, mostly, some players might still see this occur sometimes.  Let me know the club name and tag (please be appropriate!), and I'll take a look for you.  Let me know!
